title: Order
description: The order placed for a product list.

purchaseID.title: Purchase ID
purchaseID.description: Unique identifier assigned by the seller for this purchase or contract. There is no guarantee that the ID is unique.

purchaseOrderNumber.title: Purchase Order Number
purchaseOrderNumber.description: Unique identifier assigned by the purchaser for this purchase or contract.

payments.title: Payment List
payments.description: The list of payments for this order.

currencyCode.title: Currency
currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for the order totals.

priceTotal.title: Price Total
priceTotal.description: The total price of this order after all discounts and taxes have been applied.
